mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT r.id, r.name, r.description, r.created_at, r.updated_at FROM itsnow_msc.accounts acc LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON acc.id = u.account_id LEFT JOIN authorities a ON a.username = u.username LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.name = a.authority WHERE acc.id = #{accountId}

SELECT Count(DISTINCT r.id) FROM itsnow_msc.accounts acc LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON acc.id = u.account_id LEFT JOIN authorities a ON a.username = u.username LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.name = a.authority WHERE acc.id = #{accountId}
mapper.select: AND r.name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT r.id, r.name, r.description, r.created_at, r.updated_at, u.username, acc.name accountName, s.name siteName, d.name deptName FROM roles r LEFT JOIN authorities a ON r.name = a.authority LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON a.username = u.username LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.accounts acc ON u.account_id = acc.id LEFT JOIN staffs stf ON u.id = stf.user_id LEFT JOIN sites s ON stf.site_id = s.id LEFT JOIN departments d ON stf.dept_id = d.id WHERE r.name = #{name}
